description: We use a combination of double-fold Mexican vanilla extract and Madagascar bourbon vanilla paste for this classic flavor.
Made with cocoa powder and Callebaut chocolate.
Vanilla ice cream with Oreo sandwich cookie pieces.
Made with butter, cream, and lots of coarse sea salt, this is our most popular flavor.
Made with cold-brewed Bean Traders espresso beans and sweetened condensed milk
The staff have been requesting this one for ages, so we finally made it happen!
Coffee ice cream with lots of homemade magic shell mixed in.
A super fancy version of a creamsicle, basically. Made with yuzu juice from Yakami Orchard in Japan.
Made with homemade NC plum jam, cardamom, and Seven Stars yogurt.
Sweet local corn, with a swirl of fresh local blueberries!
Sweet, spicy, and tangy. A perfect summer refresher!
Blueberry lemon ice cream with Girl Scouts Lemonades cookie pieces mixed in.
A coconut cream ice cream with Vietnamese cinnamon – kinda reminds us of Cinnamon Toast Crunch.
